attributes.action: Unspoken genocide from Star Wars III to IV
attributes.additional_details:
There are a distinct lack of ethnic minorities from episode III to IV in Star Wars. Which must mean there is an unspoken genocide that is not being discussed.

George Lucas is hiding something and the public have a right to know what happened to the ethnic minorities in Star Wars. Lando Calrissian seems to be the only survivor.

Please sign the petition to find out what has happened to these poor people!
